Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1952...
Injured on 7/7/1952 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1952 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/11/1953 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/2/1953 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/28/1954 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 4/10/1955 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Northeastern on 4/15/1956 (Going to PIL: RF S. Aubrey, P E. Coy. Going to NE: RF B. Will, P J. Glaude, P D. Larson, P J. Mcguire, P P. Fanelli)...
Injured on 6/9/1956 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/30/1956 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 4/9/1958 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 7/31/1958...
Had first career hit on 8/5/1958, off Kit Keller (Mal)...
Injured on 6/15/1959 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/1/1961 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 7/18/1961 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/20/1963 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Championship with Northeastern in 1965...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/14/1966 to a 3-year deal worth $1,007,000 per year...
Released by Capital City on 4/7/1966...
Drafted in 4th round, 79th overall pick, by Manchester in 1967...
Earned first career win on 6/8/1973...
Had first career hit on 7/31/1975, off Bob Gleich (Min)...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/7/1979 to a 4-year deal worth $5,250,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
